author: jeph
text: Was told seller would ship in 2 days. The seller took 3 business days to ship and nothing was done about that. Shipping is very expensive.
title: Was told seller would ship in 2 days

author: Stephanie Zambrana
text:
My shoes are missing a stitch and when asked for the problem to be resolved or a solution. They offered me a 20 dollar coupon towards another pair. Why would I ever purchase a new pair after my horrible experience. This is their response.

Thanks for using StockX!
 
Thanks for providing me with those photos of the QR code on the tag and the issues on your Jordan 1 Nova.
 
After looking at the photos provided I noticed that this pair is within the production standards for the Jordan 1 Nova and was cleared for retail release. We unfortunately do not have control over the manufacturer's production standards and must work with products that they have cleared for release. The common manufacturing variances you are referring to on the shoe occurs when shoes are mass produced in large quantities. however I would like to offer you a $20 code towards a future purchase to help rectify the situation.
title: Don’t buy at stockx total rip off

author: Tia Danielle
text: Still waiting for my bag 🤷🏽‍♀️
title: Still waiting for my bag 🤷🏽‍♀️

author: Dexter Lovett
text: Horrible first time experience
title: Horrible first time experience

author: Adrienne
text: The system reverted to the initial size always highlighted rather than the one I ordered.  I immediately canceled order and contacted customer service.  I was ignored. This problem could have easily been solved but StockX chose to just tell me to resell the shoes. I don't want this trouble in my life.... the system should have not done that.  I won't be their customer anymore.
title: Beware of their system!

author: Marcus
text: I won’t be using again.
title: Thumbs down

author: DICI
text: Shipping too fast but Unverified used items sold after notifying you that they are new things. StockX is NEVER responsible for this transaction.
title: Used item sold.

author: Gloria
text: Haven't received my package
title: Haven't received my package

author: Olivia
text:
I have already set you a complain in regard to my order but nobody answer to it,  the StockX's seal with the QR does not work, it appears not to exist..... The box is strange, the material of the Jordan's is very poor and low quality and it looks as if they are fake.

0040733771365
title: I have already set you a complain in…

text: I placed an order on March 24 for a juicey hoodie the hoodie made it to the fed ex in my area but is on hold due to damage but I have had no updates from you guys regarding my order
title: I placed an order on March 24 for a…

author: Young riccy
text: Trash company! No return policy! 3 days? They do not really authentic shoes just slap a bs stockx green tag on them. Charges are ridiculous!! Please don't purchase anything from this company! Stick to goat!!
title: Trash company

text: We still have not received purchased product

author: Leonard
text: Never ordered from StockX before., heard really good things. So I decided to see for myself.  Disappointed thus far, taking a lot longer than I expected.  Just got email stating order is delayed with no eta. Feels like I'm getting beat for a couple hundred bucks.  Is this the norm? Lesson learned i guess.
title: Never ordered from StockX before.

author: Marina
text: They said my order get to stockx from 2 weeks ago and until now nothing is change. I really need my order as soon as possible. Or just anyone tells me what’s going on with my order. Thanks

author: Kimberly Royster
text: Still waiting on my refund!!!! Not good. Your website is absolutely terrible when trying to contact customer services!!! I deleted the app and will never order anything from you guys. I didn’t even confirm the order not receive the order. Absolutely terrible business!!!!!
title: Still waiting on my refund!!!

author: Cristal
text: This was my first time ordering from this website and I’ve never had to wait this long to receive a package that was estimated weeks ago. I bought shoes for my boyfriend last month. They haven’t given me any updates since they told me they were going to send me another pair since there was a problem with the first pair of shoes I had initially tried to buy. At this point I just want my money back because they lack communication and its way passed the time I needed them.
title: This was my first time ordering from…

text: Ordered a Supreme hoodie expecting it to arrive in about a week now it’s taking a month
title: Ordered a Supreme hoodie expecting it…
